BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BOYS AND GIRLS CLUB OF AMERICAN SAMOA

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: To promote the health social educational vocational and character development of youth of American Samoa through a comprehensive after-school and summer program that provides tutoring mentoring life skills training and enrichment sessions for children ages 6 to 18.

IRS990.Desc: SCHOOL PROGRAMS WERE PROVIDED FOR STUDENTS UNABLE TO ATTEND CLASSES DUE TO COVID RESTRICTIONS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHOOL PROGRAMS WERE PROVIDED FOR STUDENTS UNABLE TO ATTEND CLASSES TO COVID RESTRICTIONS
THE CHAIRMAN TREASURER AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEW BEFORE FILING. THE FINAL FILED FORM IS AVAILABLE FOR ALL MEMBERS.
THE CHAIRMAN DOES AN ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATION EVERY YEAR FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THE REPORT IS SHARED AT THE ANNUAL BOARD MEETING WHERE THE COMPENSATION IS DISCUSS AND APPROVED.
